data_asset_dependencies.description: list of dependent data_asset ids for the training definition

fields.description: The names of the fields. The order of fields values must be consistent with the order of fields names

id.description: Discriminates the data for multi input data situation

targets.description: Used when performing evaluation. This contains the groud truths for the input data.

input_data_references.description: input data references for the deployment job

{connection_properties}.description: Contains a set of fields specific to each connection

{location_properties}.description: Contains a set of fields specific with information about where to find the file or folder. For connections, this path is relative to the root folder of the assetfiles

schema.description: The schema of the expected data

output_data_reference.description: output data references for the deployment job

deployment.description: deployment associated to the deployment job definition

id.description: deployment id associated to the deployment job definition

hardware_spec_dependencies.description: list of dependent hardware_spec ids for the deployment job

ml_version.description: Internal version of the ml asset type

environment_variables.description: environment variables and its values required to be consumed by the batch deployment job of PyScript deployment
